original: cakkhundriyaṁ, sotindriyaṁ, ghānindriyaṁ, jivhindriyaṁ, kāyindriyaṁ, manindriyaṁ,

original: Yaṁ cakkhu catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya pasādo …pe… suñño gāmopeso—
analyzed: yam cakkhu catunnam mahābhūtānam upādāya pasādaḥ pe suññaḥ gāmopeso

original: Yo kāyo catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya pasādo …pe… suñño gāmopeso—
analyzed: yaḥ kāyo catunnam mahābhūtānam upādāya pasādaḥ pe suññaḥ gāmopeso

original: atthi kusalaṁ, atthi akusalaṁ, atthi abyākataṁ.
analyzed: atthi kusala atthi akusala atthi abyākata

original: atthi kāmāvacaraṁ, atthi rūpāvacaraṁ, atthi arūpāvacaraṁ, atthi apariyāpannaṁ.
analyzed: atthi kāmāvacara atthi rūpāvacara atthi arūpāvacara atthi apariyāpanna

original: atthi sukhindriyasampayuttaṁ, atthi dukkhindriyasampayuttaṁ, atthi somanassindriyasampayuttaṁ, atthi domanassindriyasampayuttaṁ, atthi upekkhindriyasampayuttaṁ.

analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam pe kāya viññāṇam atthi sukha sahagata atthi dukkha sahagata manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe… kāyaviññāṇaṁ, manodhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu atthi kusalā, atthi akusalā, atthi abyākatā.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam pe kāya viññāṇa manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu atthi kusalā atthi akusalā atthi abyākatā

original: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe… kāyaviññāṇaṁ atthi sukhasahagataṁ, atthi dukkhasahagataṁ, manodhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu atthi kusalā, atthi akusalā, atthi abyākatā.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam pe kāya viññāṇam atthi sukha sahagata atthi dukkha sahagata manaḥ dhātu manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu atthi kusalā atthi akusalā atthi abyākatā

original: Yaṁ itthiyā itthiliṅgaṁ itthinimittaṁ itthikuttaṁ itthākappo itthattaṁ itthibhāvo—
analyzed: yam itthiyāḥ itthi liṅgam itthi nimittam itthikuttam itthākappaḥ itthattam itthi bhāvaḥ

original: Yaṁ purisassa purisaliṅgaṁ purisanimittaṁ purisakuttaṁ purisākappo purisattaṁ purisabhāvo—
analyzed: yam purisassa purisa liṅgam purisa nimittam purisa kuttam purisa ākappaḥ purisa ttam purisa bhāvaḥ
atthi rūpa jīvita indriya atthi arūpa jīvita indriya

original: Yo tesaṁ rūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ—
analyzed: yaḥ tesam rūpīnam dhammānam āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitam jīvitindriya

original: Yo tesaṁ arūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ—
analyzed: yaḥ tesam arūpīnam dhammānam āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitam jīvitindriya

original: Yaṁ kāyikaṁ sātaṁ kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ kāyasamphassajaṁ sātaṁ sukhaṁ vedayitaṁ kāyasamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
analyzed: yam kāyikam sātam kāyikam sukham kāya samphassa jam sātam sukham vedayitam kāya samphassa jā sātā sukhā vedanā

original: Yaṁ kāyikaṁ asātaṁ kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ kāyasamphassajaṁ asātaṁ dukkhaṁ vedayitaṁ kāyasamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā—

analyzed: yam cetasikam sātam cetasikam sukham cetaḥ samphassa jam sātam sukham vedayitam cetaḥ samphassa jā sātā sukhā vedanā

analyzed: yam cetasikam na iva sātam na asātam cetaḥ samphassa jam adukkham asukham vedayitam cetaḥ samphassa jā adukkham asukhā vedanā

original: Yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo saddhā saddhindriyaṁ saddhābalaṁ—
analyzed: yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādaḥ saddhā saddhi indriyam saddhā bala

original: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo ṭhiti

a sithila parakkama tā a nikkhitta chanda tā a nikkhitta dhura tā dhura sampaggāhaḥ vīriya

original: Navindriyā siyā vipākā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā.

original: Cha indriyā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā.
analyzed: cha indriyā siyā pīti sahagatā siyā sukha sahagatā siyā upekkhā sahagatā

original: Cattārindriyā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na vattabbā—“pītisahagatā”tipi, “sukhasahagatā”tipi, “upekkhāsahagatā”tipi.

original: Pannarasindriyā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbā.

original: Domanassindriyaṁ siyā dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ, siyā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ.

original: Navindriyā siyā parittā, siyā mahaggatā, siyā appamāṇā.

original: Domanassindriyaṁ siyā parittārammaṇaṁ siyā mahaggatārammaṇaṁ, na appamāṇārammaṇaṁ, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“parittārammaṇan”tipi, “mahaggatārammaṇan”tipi.

original: Navindriyā siyā parittārammaṇā, siyā mahaggatārammaṇā, siyā appamāṇārammaṇā, siyā na vattabbā—“parittārammaṇā”tipi, “mahaggatārammaṇā”tipi, “appamāṇārammaṇā”tipi.
analyzed: nava indriyā siyā paritta ārammaṇā siyā mahaggata ārammaṇā siyā appamāṇa ārammaṇā siyā na vattabbā aparitta ārammaṇā atipi mahaggata ārammaṇā atipi appamāṇa ārammaṇā atipi

original: Cha indriyā siyā hīnā, siyā majjhimā, siyā paṇītā.

original: Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na maggārammaṇaṁ, siyā maggahetukaṁ, siyā maggādhipati, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“maggahetukan”tipi, “maggādhipatī”tipi.
analyzed: na magga ārammaṇa siyā magga hetuka siyā magga adhipati siyā na vattabba magga hetuka tipi magga adhipati itipi

original: Aññindriyaṁ na maggārammaṇaṁ, siyā maggahetukaṁ, siyā maggādhipati, siyā na vattabbaṁ—“maggahetukan”tipi, “maggādhipatī”tipi.
analyzed: aññindriyam na magga ārammaṇa siyā magga hetuka siyā magga adhipati siyā na vattabba magga hetuka tipi magga adhipati itipi

original: Navindriyā siyā maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino, siyā na vattabbā—“maggārammaṇā”tipi, “maggahetukā”tipi, “maggādhipatino”tipi.

original: Dasindriyā siyā uppannā, siyā uppādino, na vattabbā—“anuppannā”ti.

original: Dvindriyā siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, na vattabbā—“uppādino”ti.

original: Dasindriyā siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino.
analyzed: dasa indriyā siyā uppannā siyā anuppannā siyā uppādinaḥ

original: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.

original: Dasindriyā siyā atītārammaṇā, siyā anāgatārammaṇā, siyā paccuppannārammaṇā, siyā na vattabbā—“atītārammaṇā”tipi, “anāgatārammaṇā”tipi, “paccuppannārammaṇā”tipi.

analyzed: cha indriyāḥ na vattabbā a hetū ca iva hetu sampayuttā ca ati siyā hetu sampayuttā ca iva na ca hetū siyā na vattabbā a hetu sampayuttā ca iva na ca hetu iti
